prompt: My son just graduated college. He has worked so hard for this.
I lost my credit card and someone charged 500 dollars on it. I am so angry about it.
I took a sip of milk at work and it was sour. I was really sickened by it.
I took a medical test today.  I am so nervous to find out the results.
my wife is the best! im so lucky tohave her!
My Mother called me up and said she was in town today.  She took me out to eat and brought me a book as a gift.
Some days I listen to sad music at work
One time I had a job interview that went really well. I was positive that they liked me and were going to hire me.
My husband lost his job. It was 3 weeks before christmas.
